name: Active Starts
overview: Active Starts is a professional angel investment firm. Our investment focus is on California-based software start-ups within a year from product launch. We help talented entrepreneurs maximize their chances of successfully validating the market opportunity they are pursuing. Our financial results are a function of the demonstrated technology innovation, leadership skills and operating excellence of the management teams we encourage relentlessly, and of our collective ability to execute on a sound financing strategy to continuously create value for founders, managers and investors.

image.attribution: Eric di Benedetto on Convergence Partners
